title: LA Clippers
description: The Los Angeles Clippers are a professional basketball team that plays in the NBA. I was responsible for the development of the team's website, Clippers.com, and their camp website, ClippersCamp.com.
responsibilities: Led frontend development for Clippers.com and ClippersCamp.com using Vue.js and Nuxt
Built emergency donation site FireAidLA.org for LA wildfire relief in under 72 hours
Integrated REST APIs and third-party systems for ticketing and merchandise
Mentored junior developers and established Git workflows for the team
achievements: Generated over $100,000 in donations through FireAidLA.org emergency site
Enhanced ADA compliance across all team digital properties
Standardized development workflows and QA processes for the organization
